value.title: StarCraft 2: The BEST of the Worst! (Painful 1v1s)
value.excerpt: Two viewer submitted games of StarCraft 2 between Zerg and Protoss players in Bronze League and Silver League. value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MOST PAINFUL MATCH EVER? (Florencio's Cheese)
value.excerpt: A very fun match of StarCraft 2. This has to be one of the most painful and smartest games of StarCraft I've casted. In this game Florencio combines two flavours of cheese to create the perfect early game push. value.title: StarCraft 2: The ZERG's Command Center! (Viewer Game)
